data.title: JEON HYO SEONG - [TOP SECRET] Single Album NOMAL Edition

Your purchase quant
data.text:
Release Date: August 31, 2017

Depending on versions, contents (cover, photo book, mini book, photo cards, posters, etc.) in the official album package may vary.

All products are officially distributed BRAND NEW and FACTORY SEALED packages.

Your purchase quantity will count towards HANTEO, CIRCLE (GAON) and BILLBOARD Charts.

Track List

DISK(CD) 1.

01. 여자를 몰라

02. Good-night Kiss

03. 밤이 싫어요

Description (Translated):

Standing alone with SECRET, more than 'TOP SECRET'!

From a bright and lovely girl to an alluring and sexy woman, since her debut in 2009, Hyoseong Jeon, the leader of Secret, who has established herself as an 'all-weather muse' by repeatedly transforming herself, will finally stand alone with a solo album. In 2014, she proudly presented her name to the music industry with the three letters of the name 'Hyosung Jeon', and has completed all preparations to draw everyone's attention with her unique bright and healthy energy.

Rediscovery of Jeon Hyo-seong, a vocalist with a unique charm and a performer

Jun Hyo-sung's first single album is an ambitious work that he prepared with great care for a long time. Jeon Hyoseong, who has challenged more diverse genres and styles, captivates the ears with her charming voice and solid singing ability that gently tickles the listener's heart, and makes her unable to take her eyes off for a moment with her more delicate emotions and diversified facial expressions. In addition, Hyoseong Jeon, who has been exuding a unique presence on stage with her golden ratio and elastic body, proves the value of 'ONE&ONLY', which is incomparable, with a more sensual and dizzying performance by adding maturity in this album. Up until now, she has gradually strengthened her internal stability, developed her capabilities as a solo artist, and stood on a new starting line with the unique color of 'Jun Hyo-seong'. Now, you who listen to her songs will be completely mesmerized by her without even realizing it.

The title song 'Good-night Kiss' is a dance song with an impressive repetitive chorus. It attempts a crossover with the hip-hop trend, TRAP, and breaks the uniform composition, setting a difference from existing dance songs. The melody created by borrowing an oral song called an American lullaby and the addictive hook harmonized with Jeon Hyo-seong's sweet vocals to complete Jeon Hyo-seong's unique dance. Jeon Hyo-seong, who has blossomed like a single flower in full bloom in the clear spring sunlight, shouts out to the world the hearts of all women who are more beautiful and more dazzling than anyone else just by being honest without embellishment. The first solo single album of Hyosung Jeon, who will take a step forward as the eternal 'romance' of male fans and the absolute 'wannabe' of female fans, will be recorded as the biggest transformation and the most dazzling moment for her.

★ Album Specifications ★

1. 170 X 200

2. to 44 pages + cover 4 pages

Description (Original):

SECRET, 그 이상의 ‘TOP SECRET’으로 화려한 홀로서기!

밝고 사랑스러운 소녀에서부터 고혹적이고 섹시한 여자에 이르기까지, 2009년 데뷔 이후 지금까지 변신에 변신을 거듭하며 ‘전천후 뮤즈’로서 자리매김 해 온 시크릿의 리더 전효성이 마침내 솔로 앨범으로 홀로서기에 나선다. 2014년 가요계에 ‘전효성’의 이름 세 자로 당당하게 출사표를 내민 그녀는 특유의 밝고 건강한 에너지로 모든 이들의 이목을 집중시킬 모든 준비를 마쳤다.

유니크한 매력의 보컬, 그리고 퍼포먼서- 전효성의 재발견

전효성의 첫 싱글 앨범은 오랜 시간 심혈을 기울여 준비한 야심작이다. 보다 다양한 장르와 스타일에 도전한 전효성은 살랑살랑 듣는 이의 마음을 간지럽히는 매력적인 목소리와 탄탄한 가창력으로 귀를 사로잡고, 더욱 섬세해진 감정과 다양해진 표정 연기로 한 순간도 눈을 뗄 수 없게 만든다. 또한 그 동안 황금 비율과 탄력 있는 몸매로 무대 위에서 남다른 존재감을 발산해 온 전효성은 이번 앨범에서 성숙미를 더해 더욱 관능적이고 아찔한 퍼포먼스로 비교 불가능한 ‘ONE&ONLY’의 가치를 입증한다. 지금까지 그녀는 차근차근 내실을 다지고 성장하며 솔로로서의 역량을 키워 온전히 ‘전효성’만의 색깔을 품고 새로운 출발선에 섰다. 이제, 그녀의 노래를 듣는 당신은 자신도 모르는 사이 그녀에게 완벽히 매료되고 말 것이다.

타이틀곡 ‘Good-night Kiss’는 반복되는 후렴구가 인상적인 댄스 곡으로 힙합 트렌드인 TRAP으로의 크로스 오버를 시도하며 천편일률적인 구성을 파괴, 기존의 댄스 곡들과의 차별성을 두었다. 미국의 자장가(lullaby)로 불리는 구전 가요를 차용해 만든 멜로디와 중독성 짙은 HOOK이 전효성의 sweet한 보컬과 어우러져 ‘전효성’만의 댄스를 완성해냈다. 완연한 봄 햇살 속에 어느새 한 송이의 꽃처럼 새롭게 활짝 피어난 전효성은 꾸밈 없이 솔직해서 더 아름다운, 그 존재 자체만으로도 그 누구보다 눈부신 모든 여성들의 마음을 세상에 외친다. 남성 팬들의 영원한 ‘로망’이자 여성 팬들의 절대적 ‘워너비’로 한 걸음 더 도약할 전효성의 첫 번째 솔로 싱글 앨범은 그녀에게 있어 가장 큰 변신이자 가장 눈부신 순간으로 기록될 것이다.

★ 앨범 사양 ★

1. 170 X 200

2. 내지 44페이지 + 커버 4페이지

Our standard handling time for shipping albums is typically between 1 to 3 business days. Pre-orders may require additional time to prepare and ship, depending on order volume. Orders that contain pre-ordered items will be shipped as a whole once the latest released items become available.

Estimated Worldwide Delivery Time

Worldwide Express: 3-7 business days

US and Europe Standard: 13 -20 business days

Canada Standard: 13 -20+ business days

Australia, New Zealand Standard: 13 -20 business days

Japan and the Asia Pacific Standard: 8 -11 business days

Rest of the World Standard: 13-20+ business days

Shipping Carriers

Worldwide Express: FedEx, DHL Express

Worldwide Standard: Korea Post (K-packet)

US Standard: USPS (forwarded by ECMS)

Europe, AU Standard: Various Carriers (forwarded by Rincos and Cello Square)

We offer tracking numbers for all shipments, enabling our customers to conveniently track their packages via the online tracking site.

Customs Duties and Taxes

Please note that all purchases may be subject to taxes, such as sales tax, value-added tax (VAT), and customs duties. South Korea has Free Trade Agreements with many countries and music CDs may be exempt from customs duties in certain countries. Nonetheless, we cannot guarantee any exemptions from these taxes that may occur during the shipment process, and customers are responsible for paying the applicable taxes unless we withhold the tax. If you have any questions or concerns regarding tax and customs fees, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team for assistance.

Incomplete or Incorrect Shipping Address

Providing a complete shipping address, including the house number or apartment room number, is crucial as packages may get lost in transit without this information. Please note that if the package is lost due to an incomplete or incorrect shipping address provided by you, the responsibility lies with you.
